thread.title: WPP reviewing structure as results boost shares

title: WPP reviewing structure as results boost shares
text:
WPP reviewing structure as results boost shares Monday, April 30, 2018 - 01:25
Mark Read, tasked with running WPP after the abrupt departure of founder Martin Sorrell, says he believes the world's biggest advertising group has the tools to navigate a rapidly changing industry as it reports better-than-expected quarterly results. Francis Maguire reports
Mark Read, tasked with running WPP after the abrupt departure of founder Martin Sorrell, says he believes the world's biggest advertising group has the tools to navigate a rapidly changing industry as it reports better-than-expected quarterly results. Francis Maguire reports //reut.rs/2FrbIwd
